short_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking information from industry on what environmentally-friendly resources exist to either repurpose, recycle or convert to waste unused Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

**tenderDescription-descriptionAppelOffres-eng**:
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites industry stakeholders to provide information on environmentally friendly resources for repurposing, recycling or converting Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) to waste. The objective is to gather knowledge on market readiness from suppliers, industry associations, and other stakeholders to inform procurement strategies, divest
